issue.title: [Rust] Remove OffsetSize::prefix
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11951](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11951). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

Background:
Left over cleanups suggested by from @sunchao on  https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9425

Broken out from https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9508

Rationale:
This function is redundant with `OffsetSize::is_large`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11951?focusedCommentId=17301103) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9690
